TopicTitle: Fanwork Friday: runners up for our Valentina Kerman contest

Articles.Content: Time to reveal the winners of our Valentina’s Day contest! The ultimate winner will be announced by Maxmaps during Squadcast (19:30 EST / 00:30 UTC tonight on **[http://www.twitch.tv/ksptv/](KSPTV**) but we’ll give you a teaser by showing you the runners up. The task of making a selection between all the entries was certainly not an easy one, it felt somewhat cruel. A massive, massive thank you to everyone who participated in the contest, we enjoyed seeing all your creations. 'So, without further ado, we present to you' the runners up of the Valentina's Day contest! *\*drum roll\** Orbital\_Phoenix’s Kerbal Space Program poster featuring Valentina in the role of bad-ass and pilot of a team or three Little Katie’s depiction of Valentina Kerman holding on to the antenna of a Vostok-6 while flying over Kerbin.

I liked Little Katie's video, showing the picture as a WIP with entertaining and informative commentary. But I think Orbital\_Phoenix's picture is a little bit better. They're both real good. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Man, that winner must be extraordinary to beat those two.

Oh my god why did I make that

![:o](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_ohmy.png)

They announced the winner! 

![from_today_we_workin_together_by_kyasarinn-d8iyx2m.jpg](http://fc05.deviantart.net/fs71/i/2015/052/9/0/from_today_we_workin_together_by_kyasarinn-d8iyx2m.jpg)

Also thanks so much for making my entry runner up ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) :D ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)!!!! It means so much to me.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-02-28T01:33:56Z" title="02/28/2015 01:33  AM" data-short="9 yr">February 28, 2015</time> by Little Katie**
  
typing with naughty parrot on my arm

this made me lol.

Oribtals picture is the buisness, really like that (Congrats to the winner btw!!)
Orbital's painting has a very soviet feel to it, making it a great homage to Valentina's namesake.
